headline: Verde Clean Fuels, Inc. Announces Suspension of Development of Permian Basin Project
summary: HOUSTON, February 06, 2026--Verde Clean Fuels, Inc. (NASDAQ: VGAS) ("Verde" or the "Company") announced today the suspension of development of its Permian Basin project primarily as a result of changing market conditions driven by increasing demand for natural gas in the Permian Basin.

raw.headline: Verde Clean Fuels, Inc. Announces Suspension of Development of Permian Basin Project
raw.summary: HOUSTON, February 06, 2026--Verde Clean Fuels, Inc. (NASDAQ: VGAS) ("Verde" or the "Company") announced today the suspension of development of its Permian Basin project primarily as a result of changing market conditions driven by increasing demand for natural gas in the Permian Basin.

headline: APA Corporation: The Great FCF Machine
summary: APA Corporation features Permian efficiency, Suriname's GranMorgu project potential, and a 53.2% FCF yield at a low 7.09 P/E. Read why APA stock is a buy.
